base_description: Tall cylindrical cup, brown and white stripes.
part_description: Comprises three parts: top lid, cylindrical body, and base. The body is striped with brown and white sections, evenly spaced.
internal_interaction_description: The lid fits securely on top of the cylindrical body, preventing spills. The striped design is integrated within the body, providing an aesthetic appearance. The base supports the structure, ensuring stability when placed on surfaces.
external_interaction_description: The cup can be held comfortably by hand for drinking. It interacts with liquids, containing them securely. It can be placed on flat surfaces without tipping over, and fits in standard cup holders, making it portable for travel.
